Text:
She's the real deal... no electronics, just an acoustic guitar, brilliant lyrics and a genuinely emotive voice.

Sad there's no one seeding.
Come on there cowboy!  Ride that seeding horse of yours into a gallop.  Rake those spurs and get Joni out there!
"Approval" is such a mild word. Would you settle for "applause"?
Great to see these in flac. Thank You.
